text:
Company Background:
Taylor Ltd is a global leader in providing comprehensive information security solutions. Our team is dedicated to protecting our clients' data and ensuring compliance with industry standards. We value accessibility, diversity, and inclusiveness in our work environment.

Job Type:
Full-time

Job Description:
Taylor Ltd is seeking an Information Security Audit and Compliance Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring our information security practices meet regulatory standards, managing audit processes, and maintaining compliance across all operations.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct regular security audits and assessments.
- Develop and implement compliance policies and procedures.
- Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to ensure regulatory adherence.
- Provide training and guidance on compliance issues.
- Prepare detailed reports on audit findings and compliance status.
- Stay current with industry standards and best practices.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor’s degree in Information Security, Computer Science, or a related field.
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in information security and compliance.
- Strong knowledge of regulatory requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
- Relevant certifications (e.g., CISA, CISSP) are a plus.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from $80,000 to $120,000, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health and dental insurance.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Inclusive and supportive work environment.

Application Process:
Our hiring process is designed to be accessible to everyone. We are committed to providing a supportive environment and ensuring equal opportunities for all candidates. All candidates will be considered based on merit.

To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and qualifications.

Taylor Ltd is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
